title: Russian air strikes hit Ukraine for a second day
description: The mayor of Lviv says four electricity supply stations were destroyed. Also: funerals take place in Thailand for those killed in last week's kindergarten attack; and the world’s first ultra-realistic robot artist gives evidence on whether robots pose a threat to human creativity.
itunes:subtitle: The mayor of Lviv says four electricity supply stations were destroyed
itunes:summary: The mayor of Lviv says four electricity supply stations were destroyed. Also: funerals take place in Thailand for those killed in last week's kindergarten attack; and the world’s first ultra-realistic robot artist gives evidence on whether robots pose a threat to human creativity.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
